About

LightSpeed is a lightweight Jekyll theme designed to be privacy-friendly (no very little JavaScript), fast, and excellent at delivering content.

About, Further

This second section demonstrates spacing. CSS is kept to a minimum with minor styling for site colours and spacing. prism.js is used for code styling.
